video.title: Good Girls
video.synopsis: Three suburban moms orchestrate a local grocery store heist to escape financial ruin and establish independence -- together.

episodes.synopsis: As Beth, Ruby and Annie face personal and financial crises, they decide to team up and take back their lives -- by robbing their local grocery store.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Beth and Annie reveal a major change of plans to Ruby as one dangerous rival's threats redefine the rules of the heist.
episodes.title: Mo Money Mo Problems

episodes.synopsis: The ladies acquire a getaway car and hit the road for a mysterious mission. Annie and Sadie prepare for a crucial meeting.
episodes.title: Borderline

episodes.synopsis: Beth finds a shocking surprise in her daughter’s room, Ruby deals with a difficult customer at work, and Annie helps Sadie with a heartbreaking issue.
episodes.title: Atom Bomb

episodes.synopsis: After an unexpected visitor drops by, Beth encourages the group to rethink their new deal. Annie makes an impulsive decision and a critical mistake.
episodes.title: Taking Care of Business

episodes.synopsis: Ruby, Beth and Annie look to expand their lucrative business. Dean and Stan stumble upon new information and grow increasingly suspicious.
episodes.title: A View from the Top

episodes.synopsis: As new money rolls in, the ladies indulge in some of life's finer things, but a rogue associate threatens to dismantle the entire operation.
episodes.title: Special Sauce

episodes.synopsis: When Rio freezes all activity, Beth, Ruby and Annie return to their day jobs and orchestrate an unorthodox plan for quick cash.
episodes.title: Shutdown

episodes.synopsis: The ladies contemplate Eddy’s fate, Ruby and Stan receive life-changing news, and Rio offers a new assignment with puzzling consequences.
episodes.title: Summer of the Shark

episodes.synopsis: All bets are off as Beth, Ruby and Annie work to outwit Rio and restore independence before time runs out on one final heist.
episodes.title: Remix

episodes.synopsis: Beth grapples with Rio’s unnerving ask. Elsewhere, Ruby and Stan reach a new low, and Annie and Gregg navigate a new not-so-normal.
episodes.title: I'd Rather Be Crafting

episodes.synopsis: As Rio raises the stakes with a critical job, Mary Pat struggles with her ties to Boomer, and Annie shares an awkward evening with Nancy.
episodes.title: Slow Down, Children at Play

episodes.synopsis: Things go awry when the ladies recruit Mary Pat for a pressing mission. Meanwhile, Beth receives surprising news about Kenny.
episodes.title: You Have Reached the Voicemail of Leslie Peterson

episodes.synopsis: Beth, Ruby and Annie deal with the demands of Rio’s "kingdom." As the drama evolves, Annie takes a closer look at Boomer’s cruelest scheme.
episodes.title: Pick Your Poison

episodes.synopsis: An inside threat pushes the ladies toward a desperate alliance. Annie uncovers a pivotal secret. Beth and Dean make a domestic deal.
episodes.title: Everything Must Go

episodes.synopsis: While Dean explores a new routine, Beth uncovers Rio’s latest operation, and Agent Turner sets his sights on Ruby and Stan.
episodes.title: Take Off Your Pants

episodes.synopsis: Ruby struggles with the truth, Dean prepares for a devious plan, and Beth makes a special delivery … with a team of unwitting accomplices.
episodes.title: The Dubby

episodes.synopsis: After years of loyal friendship, Ruby redefines her relationship with Beth. Annie and Noah's date takes a strange turn. Dean's plans turn disastrous.
episodes.title: Thelma and Louise

episodes.synopsis: Stan’s fate forces the ladies to take unusual action. Elsewhere, Noah digs deep into Annie’s personal life, and Beth longs for a taste of normalcy.
episodes.title: One Last Time

episodes.synopsis: A field trip turns into a potential payday for Annie and Ruby. Back home, Beth tends to the sweeter side of life -- for a moment.
episodes.title: This Land Is Your Land

episodes.synopsis: A chilling surprise leads to a fresh request from Rio, Annie has a chat with Noah, and Dean makes a demand of his own.
episodes.title: Hunting Season

episodes.synopsis: As Dean explores a new beginning, the ladies unpack Mary Pat’s dark past. Meanwhile, Annie digs deeper into her own suspicions.
episodes.title: Jeff

episodes.synopsis: Tensions mount as Agent Turner's team gets set for a takedown, and Beth, Ruby and Annie prepare to make a desperate deal with an unlikely ally.
episodes.title: King

episodes.synopsis: A new season of scheming begins as the ladies work to perfect their craft. Beth grapples with grief and guilt — and faces an unexpected visitor.
episodes.title: Find Your Beach

episodes.synopsis: Ruby shares shocking news with the group. Annie fields critical feedback from Nancy and Gregg. Beth butts heads with her mother-in-law.
episodes.title: Not Just Cards

episodes.synopsis: As a chilling encounter pushes Beth to her limits, Ruby makes an ask of Stan, Annie revisits her childhood, and Dean receives an intimate invitation.
episodes.title: Egg Roll

episodes.synopsis: The ladies keep an eye on a new neighborhood “friend.” Stan struggles with Sara’s choices. Dean makes a deadly purchase. Annie gets candid with Josh.
episodes.title: The Eye in Survivor

episodes.synopsis: A printing dilemma leads to a peculiar mission for Annie. Rio re-examines his partnership with Beth — and strikes up a deal with an unlikely accomplice.
episodes.title: Au Jus

episodes.synopsis: Max’s emotional search for Lucy creates a moral debacle for Beth, Ruby and Annie. Elsewhere, Stan receives an update about his suspension.
episodes.title: Frere Jacques

episodes.synopsis: The ladies consider their next move ... with Max. Stan explores the risks and rewards of a new proposition. Dean stages a professional shake-up.
episodes.title: Vegas, Baby

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to regain Rio’s trust, Beth accepts a mysterious assignment and entertains an unexpected detour. Annie attempts to get closer to Josh.
episodes.title: Nana

episodes.synopsis: The ladies lose access to a piece of the operation. Beth makes a mistake during a meet-up with Rio. Ruby recruits Sara's help. Dean celebrates big news.
episodes.title: Incentive

episodes.synopsis: Beth, Ruby and Annie anxiously await word of Rio’s fate. Later, Sara orchestrates a poignant dinner party, and Ben helps Annie with her GED strategy.
episodes.title: Opportunity

episodes.synopsis: As Rio redefines the rules, Beth makes a plan with Dean. Meanwhile, Stan gets stuck in the middle of a mission, and Ruby’s phone falls into new hands.
episodes.title: Synergy
